issue.title: Unable to build benches in arrow crate.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5159](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5159). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After the refactor of kernel related files in ARROW-5116, the files in `bench` folder won't compile.

eg. 

error[E0432]: unresolved import `arrow::compute::boolean_kernels`
 --> arrow/benches/boolean_kernels.rs:26:5
 |
26 | use arrow::compute::boolean_kernels;
 | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ no `boolean_kernels` in `compute`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5159?focusedCommentId=16815039) by Chao Sun (csun):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4138
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4138>
